Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.16963159]Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus A270 (MIC=6 µM), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538 (MIC=6 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli SBS 363 (MIC=6 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 14502 (MIC=6.6 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref:16844081]Non-hemolytic activity upto 53 μM against human red blood cells;[Ref.16963159]Non-hemolytic activity at 6 μM against erythrocytes
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity against Gram-negative bacteria and Gram-positive bacteria. Also has antiprotozoal activity against L. amazonensis. No hemolytic activity.
